net.canarymod.api.world.blocks

Interface NoteBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TileEntity

    public interface NoteBlock
extends TileEntity
    Wrap a TileEntityNote etc
    Author:
    Chris (damagefilter)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte getInstrument()
      Returns the instrument for this note block as byte value
      Wood based blocks = 4 (Bass Guitar)
      Sand/Gravel blocks = 2 (Snare Drum)
      Glass blocks = 3 (Clicks / Rimshots))
      Stone/rocks based blocks = 1 (Bassdrum)
      all other blocks = 0 (Piano)
      byte getNote()
      Get the current note pitch
      void play()
      Emit a sound from this note block
      void setNote(byte note)
      Set the note pitch

      • Methods inherited from interface net.canarymod.api.world.blocks.TileEntity

        getBlock, getDataTag, getMetaTag, getWorld, getX, getY, getZ, readFromTag, update, writeToTag

      • getInstrument

        byte getInstrument()
        Returns the instrument for this note block as byte value
        Wood based blocks = 4 (Bass Guitar)
        Sand/Gravel blocks = 2 (Snare Drum)
        Glass blocks = 3 (Clicks / Rimshots))
        Stone/rocks based blocks = 1 (Bassdrum)
        all other blocks = 0 (Piano)
        Returns:
        instrument byte
